newsitem.title: USA: Wang Labs unit wins $105 mln contract.
newsitem.headline: Wang Labs unit wins $105 mln contract.

text.p: Wang Laboratories Inc said on Friday that its Wang Government Services Inc unit has won a $105 million government contract for TEMPEST and Zone secure systems and maintenance services.
TEMPEST and Zone products include Pentium desktop computers, Hewlett-Packard LaserJet printers, wireless LAN systems and color scanners.

Under the five-year agreement, the Department of Defense Intelligence Information System community and selected U.S. government agencies may competitively purchase Wang secure systems and services, including TEMPEST and Zone systems, Wang said in a statement.
Wang is a network and desktop integration and services company.
